# id: ExceptionProxy -> public void checkAndThrowException() throws Exception
commentText: Checks whether an exception has been set via {@link #reportError(Throwable)}._If yes, that exception if re-thrown by this method.__@throws Exception This method re-throws the exception, if set.
codeText: public void checkAndThrowException() throws Exception {_		Throwable t = exception.get()__		if (t != null) {_			if (t instanceof Exception) {_				throw (Exception) t__			}_			else if (t instanceof Error) {_				throw (Error) t__			}_			else {_				throw new Exception(t)__			}_		}_	}

commentText: Creates an exception proxy that interrupts the given thread upon_report of an exception. The thread to interrupt may be null.__@param toInterrupt The thread to interrupt upon an exception. May be null.
codeText: public ExceptionProxy(@Nullable Thread toInterrupt) {_		this.toInterrupt = toInterrupt__		this.exception = new AtomicReference<>()__	}

commentText:
Sets the exception and interrupts the target thread,_if no other exception has occurred so far.__

The exception is only set (and the interruption is only triggered),_if no other exception was set before.__@param t The exception that occurred
codeText: public void reportError(Throwable t) {_		_		if (t != null && exception.compareAndSet(null, t) && toInterrupt != null) {_			toInterrupt.interrupt()__		}_	}
